0.1.name: wordpress/wp-posts-fb-notes
0.1.description:
this plugin allow your Facebook visitor to register in just a click, and synchronize your Facebook notes and WordPress posts and their comments

What's new? * works without any theme modification, just add the widget * sync with Facebook links (multiple links per posts) * login users automatically when connected by Facebook * create blog users for the connected Facebookers

Why WP-FB? * let Facebooker register in your site in a second * bidirectional synchronization notes/posts * bidirectional synchronization notes/posts comments * support both user profiles and pages * automatic Hourly/Daily sync (optional) * Using Facebook official library * no more curl (faster and safer) * support all language * allow Facebook user to Login and comment in your blog directly * get commenter Facebook profile pic

do you have any feedback or suggestion? let us know
